summary: ENB with FXAA Profile for beautiful graphics
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][u]Graphical Enhancement Version 3.0[/u][/b][/size]

Today I release Graphical Enhancement version 3.0

It\'s a lot better improved version, I would say it\'s nearly perfect now. I really enjoy walking through the world now, it looks amazing, colors are very natural now not oversaturated or anything like that. Nights are very nice too, not too dark and not too bright. Please try it out and tell me what you think of it and if you want and can, upload some pictures here. Just press the print key on your keyboard (next to F12) and skyrim will create a bmp and png picture in your skyrim folder :)










How to Install:

1. extract everything from the rar file to your skyrim main folder (where your TESV.exe is located)

optional: If you update from a previous Version, make sure to overwrite everything.

How to uninstall:

Just delete all files that you extracted from the rar file from your skyrim main folder.




[u]Other Mods I used (optinal) (Credits):[/u]

- Serious HD Retexture Landscape Skyrim by Z4G4 (1024 version)
- Skyrim Flora Overhaul by vurt
- Glowing Ore Veins 300 by Baratan
- Enhanced Blood Textures by dDefinder
- No More Blocky Faces by Xenius
- Enhanced Distant Terrain by OpticShooter
- ENB series by Boris Vorontsov
- Realistic Smoke and Embers by isoku
author: LandsHeer
